data.message: Dear facebook you really need to fix your app for facebook because just a few minutes ago when I had to reset my modum to get back my internet when I went onto facebook none of my facebook games showed up and they are supposwd to show up everytime that I am on facebook there is something wrong with your facebook app my games would show up if I reloaded the page but I shouldn't have to reload the facebook page at all my games should alway's show up when I go onto facebook you need to fix your facebook app so that my facebook games are alway's on my facebook page everytime that I go onto facebook please fix the issue ASAP meaning right NOW!
